title: [Large-Scale] Clinical Skills Foundation Competency Enhancement Course for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and foundational patient interaction competencies
context.additional_context: A Non-Major-Friendly Educational Program for General Citizens, Designed to Improve Emergency Response Skills in Real-Life Situations

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic vital sign measurement procedures (blood pressure, pulse, respiration) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can apply the 5-step patient assessment protocol (consciousness/respiration/hemorrhage/fracture/pain) in emergency scenarios within a simulation environment
Learners achieve teamwork competency of 3.5 points or higher on a 4-point scale (1-4) through peer evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
